data.name: Cat
data.description: The Basic Cat.

data.name: Macho Cat
data.description:
Charm point: muscle definition.
Basic Cat.

data.name: Mohawk Cat
data.description:
Charm point: muscle definition.
Added charm point: beautiful hair.

data.name: Tank Cat
data.description:
Tough. High health. (Area Attack)
Strong enough to move a pebble.

data.name: Wall Cat
data.description:
Rigid defense. Now with corners (Area Attack)
Strong enough to move a small rock

data.name: Eraser Cat
data.description:
Can take a beating thanks to elasticity.
Really Good ™ Defense. (Area Attack)
Strong enough to move two small rocks.

data.name: Axe Cat
data.description:
Combat maniac.
Strong against Red enemies.

data.name: Brave Cat
data.description:
Hero wannabe.
Strong against Red enemies.

data.name: Dark Cat
data.description:
Dark Knight wannabe
Decent Battle Cat
Strong against Red enemies.

data.name: Gross Cat
data.description:
Able to do very a powerful long range attack.
Exceptional attack power and range.

data.name: Sexy Legs Cat
data.description:
Has pride in his overly beautiful legs.
Exceptional attack power and range.

data.name: Macho Leg Cat
data.description:
Every day is Leg Day. Mastered the Art of Leg.
Exceptional attack power and range.
Strong against Aliens

data.name: Cow Cat
data.description:
Thinks quick, acts quick, and uses his head.
Runs like the wind!

data.name: Giraffe Cat
data.description:
Thinks quick, acts quick, and uses his head.
Headbangs only to Rock'n'Roll!

data.name: Lion Cat
data.description:
Thinks quick, acts quick, and uses his head.
Uses his mane to clean the house.

data.name: Bird Cat
data.description:
Has the health of a pea.
Exceptional attack power (Area Attack)

data.name: UFO Cat
data.description:
Managed to overcome gravity.
Good against multiple enemies (Area Attack)

data.name: The Flying Cat
data.description:
It is said that it destroyed a city once
with its beams of light. Might
weaken Angel attacks (Area Attack)

data.name: Fish Cat
data.description:
Exceptional melee capability.
Strong against Red enemies.

data.name: Whale Cat
data.description:
Managed to become a carnivorous whale.
Strong against Red enemies.

data.name: Island Cat
data.description:
Perfected his form while on vacation.
Might perform Critical Attacks.
Strong against Red enemies.

data.name: Lizard Cat
data.description:
Able to attack enemies from a distance.
Powerful single shot long range attack.

data.name: Dragon Cat
data.description:
Found its way here from a fantasy world.
Powerful single shot long range attack.

data.name: King Dragon Cat
data.description:
Don't ask how he made it into the Dragon Elite.
Excellent long distance attacks.
Powerful single shot long range attack.

data.name: Titan Cat
data.description:
Blessed with extreme attack power and
ridiculous amounts of health (Area Attack)

data.name: Mythical Titan Cat
data.description:
Lord of Destruction (?) (Area Attack)
Extreme attack power and health.

data.name: Jamiera Cat
data.description:
Might knock back enemies. (Area Attack)
The Real Lord of Destruction?
Don't stretch your shirt like this.

data.name: Viking Cat
data.description:
A combat-class Cat that has
read too many fantasy novels.
Strong against Red enemies.

data.name: Thor Cat
data.description:
Having found the internet, this Cat
had its armour and weapon order made.
Strong against Red enemies.

data.name: Maximum the Fighter
data.description:
Turns out his 'order made' armor is a
knockoff brand. Even the cheap stuff is still
enough to hit Red for massive Area dmg.

data.name: Pirate Cat
data.description:
Influenced by a certain pirate cartoon,
and dreams of being a Pirate King. Can't swim.
Might knockback Red enemies.

data.name: Captain Cat
data.description:
Still thinks Pirates are cool. Still can't swim.
Doesn't get along with Ninja Cat anymore.
Might knockback Red enemies.

data.name: Dread Pirate Catley
data.description:
Just learned that there are movies about
pirates too! Inspired him to upgrade his boat.
Might knockback Red enemies.

data.name: Thief Cat
data.description:
Moves fast. Steals faster.
More money earned when defeating an enemy.

data.name: Phantom Thief Cat
data.description:
Moves too fast. Still steals the same.
Has a large treasure collection now.
More money earned when defeating an enemy.

data.name: Goemon Cat
data.description:
Bandit of legend, last seen in old Japan fighting
against the shogun's tyranny. Slips extra money
out of enemy pockets with area attacks.

data.name: Bishop Cat
data.description:
A merciful Cat that brings peace and love
to all its followers. Charges for confessions.
Might slow Floating enemies.

data.name: Monk Cat
data.description:
Envelopes the enemies in gracious serenity
to allow them to move to the afterlife
Might slow Floating enemies.

data.name: Sanzo Cat
data.description:
On a journey to save souls through enlightenment.
Mostly just beats up the local wildlife, though.
Might slow Floating enemies (Area Attack).

data.name: Fortune Teller Cat
data.description:
A Cat that loves the idea of fortune telling.
Has read one too many astrology books.
Might knockback Floating enemies.

data.name: Fisherman Cat
data.description:
Eldest son of prominent
Tuna fisherman. Gets seasick.
Might knockback Floating enemies.

data.name: Doctor Cat
data.description:
His medical philosophy is 'Hair of the Dog'.
If it doesn't kill ya, it must be working, right?!
Might knockback Floating enemies.

data.name: Shaman Cat
data.description:
Able to communicate with the supernatural.
… is what it says on the Wiki.
Might freeze Floating enemies.

data.name: Necromancer Cat
data.description:
Turns out it was the supernatural that was
controlling this Cat in the end.
Might freeze Floating enemies.

data.name: Necro-Dancer Cat
data.description:
His bewitching dance is fueled by dark
powers. Can you resist his devilish groove?
Might freeze Floating enemies for longer.

data.name: Witch Cat
data.description:
A Magical Cat that would rather be
a Magical Girl than a Witch.
Might slow Red enemies.

data.name: Sorceress Cat
data.description:
Obtained magic skills from online courses.
Really popular at parties, but doesn't get paid.
Might slow Red enemies.

data.name: Enchantress Cat
data.description:
Used her clairvoyant powers to scry the
best way to make it big on TV. Her star
power might slow Red enemy movement.

data.name: Archer Cat
data.description:
Elite ranged Cat that can provide useful
supporting fire. Bruises like a Tomato.
Deals massive damage to Floating enemies.

data.name: Cupid Cat
data.description:
Rains arrows of love upon unsuspecting foes.
Does not like to get hurt.
Deals massive damage to Floating enemies.

data.name: Cataur
data.description:
Once a glittering constellation, this demigod
hides from heaven, firing powerful arrows
at Floating enemies for massive damage.

data.name: Swordsman Cat
data.description:
Trained in a certain game to become
a magic swordsman. Very effective Battle Cat.
Fire sword does massive damage to Red enemies.

data.name: Sword Master Cat
data.description:
Mastered the art of dual wielding.
Also can use magic. Scary combination.
Flame swords do massive damage to Red enemies.

data.name: Elemental Duelist Cat
data.description:
So in tune with his blades that he can now
command the forces of nature themselves.
Flames do massive damage to Red enemies.

data.name: Matador Cat
data.description:
Fearless bullfighter dodging danger with a hearty Olé!
Pacifist at heart, his only weapon is his crimson cape.
Has a chance to dodge Red attacks.

data.name: Flamenco Cat
data.description:
Graceful dancer dodging danger to hearty Olés!
Well trained in the art of Dodging Red attacks (as
well as unwanted advances from certain tomcats.)

data.name: Bellydance Cat
data.description:
Supreme virtuoso of an vigorous, beautiful
dance. A glittering veil and hypnotic movements
help her confuse enemies and Dodge Red attacks.

data.name: Mer-Cat
data.description:
A mermaid who came onshore to meet a
prince. Survives on land by taking long breaths.
Strong vs floating, might survive a lethal strike.

data.name: Commando Cat
data.description:
Hearing her prince got kidnapped by terrorists,
Mer-Cat joined the Green Berets to save him.
Strong vs floating, might survive a lethal strike.

data.name: Cameraman Cat
data.description:
Putting her life on the line to tell the truth of the
Great Cat War. Journalistic integrity causes
huge area dmg vs Floating, might survive once.

data.name: Cat Gunslinger
data.description:
Nameless legend of the Western frontier.
Today, he's bringing out bandits to justice.
Sometimes slows Black enemies.

data.name: Cat Eastwood
data.description:
A wandering gunman of legend, wielding
his pistol for justice! Italian is his first language.
Sometimes slows Black enemies.

data.name: Rodeo Cat
data.description:
Retired from the desperado life and now in
training to win the big bullriding competition.
Sometimes slows Black enemies.

data.name: Tin Cat
data.description:
Cutting-edge firepower masked by the
soulful nostalgia of yesteryear.
Knocks back Black enemies once in a while.

data.name: Plane Cat
data.description:
Dreaming of the skies, he allowed the Cat Army
engineers to install top-class tech in his body.
Knocks back Black enemies once in a while.

data.name: Robocat Cat
data.description:
Captured by an evil organization and remade
to be an unstoppable, merciless android
who knocks back Black. (So cute, though!)

data.name: Jurassic Cat
data.description:
Descendant of an Ancient Cat Race that
existed during the Jurassic Age.
Might perform Critical attacks

data.name: Jurassic Cat Sitter
data.description:
Descendant of an Ancient Cat Race that
takes care of the young during the Jurassic Era.
Might perform Critical attacks

data.name: Catasaurus
data.description:
Discovered a cute dinosaur in a magical land
of fungi. Features extra seating for the kids!
Might perform Critical attacks.

data.name: Rocker Cat
data.description:
A peanut farmer's son, became a rocker to
avoid coming out about his nut allergies to his
family. Resistant to Angelic attacks.

data.name: Artist Cat
data.description:
After album number 2 flopped, tried to get into
fine art. Can only draw peanuts, so didn't sell.
Resistant to Angelic attacks.

data.name: Ramen Cat
data.description:
Noodles might seem like a simple dish, but
they need an artist's touch to master. Flashy
prep style also boosts defense vs Angels.

data.name: Stilts Cat
data.description:
A cat so ambitious that he built wooden stilts
to better reach for the stars.
Knocks back Angels every once in a while.

data.name: Totem Cat
data.description:
Couldn't cut it by himself, so he gathered some
pals to work together. Naturally, he's on top.
Knocks back Angels every once in a while.

data.name: Acrobat Cats
data.description:
Hopefully this pair's choice of cheap Swedish
furniture won't bring their dreams crashing to
the ground. Sometimes knocks Angels back.

data.name: Psychocat
data.description:
Bends metal when excited. Loves cereal, but
always ends up with a useless spoon before he
can eat. Sometimes slows Alien movement.

data.name: Neo Psychocat
data.description:
His happiness opens up extradimensional portals.
Don't accept his invitation to play catch-ball.
Sometimes slows Alien movement.

data.name: Corrupted Psychocat
data.description:
All will be consumed by the portals he creates.
Soon he himself will be sucked into the dark
realms. Sometimes slows Alien movement.

data.name: Wheel Cat
data.description:
Got tired of changing wheels of vehicles
so became one instead. Spins so fast it burns.
Massive damage against Aliens (Area Attack)

data.name: Solar Cat
data.description:
Got tired of moving around
so decided to become a galaxy instead.
Massive damage against Aliens (Area Attack)

data.name: Chill Cat
data.description:
An evolved Cat who is always
calm and collected at the office.
Massive area damage to Aliens.

data.name: Rover Cat
data.description:
First Cat probe produced by NYASA.
Built to resist extraterrestrial attacks, with
Warp Blocking and tough defense vs. Aliens.

data.name: Rover Cat Mk II
data.description:
Cutting edge NYASA Cat probe. Transmission
is so advanced that it even gets the dirty
channels. Tough vs Aliens, with Warp Blocking.

data.name: Catellite
data.description:
Experimental NYASA satellite made for remote
observation of areas as far as the corner store.
Tough vs Aliens, with Warp Blocking.

data.name: Gardener Cat
data.description:
Bought lovely bonsai shears by mail-order.
Now there are no more branches left in reach
by the Cat Base. Might freeze Zombies.

data.name: Lumbercat
data.description:
Kept this key weapon in an anti-Zombie kit,
instead of doing something useless like cutting
down trees. Might freeze Zombies.

data.name: Weedwacker Cat
data.description:
Ordered a fierce-looking trimmer online.
He's never actually used this tool to cut plants.
Might freeze Zombies for a bit longer.

data.name: Welterweight Cat
data.description:
Successor to a legendary Japanese boxer.
Looks the part, but he's always KO'ed in the
2nd round. Might knockback Zombies.

data.name: Heavyweight Cat
data.description:
Unorthodox technique, sure, but this afro'd
hero always gets up before the 10-count.
Might knockback Zombies.

data.name: Ectoweight Cat
data.description:
Had a near death experience trying to lose weight
for the next bout, then revived after absorbing
ghostly energy. Might knockback Zombies.

data.name: Wushu Cat
data.description:
Top student at a discount martial arts school that
costs $40 per month. Goes twice weekly after work.
Tough vs Zombies.

data.name: Sifu Cat
data.description:
Owner of a discount martial arts school. His insistence
on using custom equipment disqualifies him from
official competitions. Tough vs Zombies.

data.name: Shigong Cat
data.description:
His peerless fighting instincts obliterate any enemy in his
path. Even his battle aura sends foes fleeing in fear!
Tough vs Zombies

data.name: Pogo Cat
data.description:
Sucked in to the recent (?) trend of toys.
Still, looks pretty fun.
Cheap to produce, might survive being broken.

data.name: Masai Cat
data.description:
Volunteered overseas and experienced cultural exchange.
Took home a costume.
Cheap to produce, might survive lethal strikes.

data.name: Jiangshi Cat
data.description:
Horror movie maniac, or real g-g-ghost?
Mystic seal is just this month's gas bill...
Cheap to produce, 100% survives once!

data.name: Salon Cat
data.description:
Has no limit when it comes to beauty care.
Works very well with Sexy Legs Cat.
Exceptional Range Attack (Area Attack)

data.name: Paris Cat
data.description:
A very stylish cat that earned the name
Jeanne. Might be French, not sure.
Exceptional Range Attack (Area Attack)

data.name: Cyborg Cat
data.description:
The ultimate bionic battle angel.
Perfect both aesthetically and technically.
Long distance Area Attack specialist.

data.name: Onmyoji Cat
data.description:
Exorcist who time traveled from the past.
Always trying to purge sportscars of evil.
Sometimes weakens non-Metal enemies.

data.name: Magica Cat
data.description:
Magical Girl by alien contract - the
shiny staff came as a signing bonus.
Sometimes weakens non-Metal enemies.

data.name: Thaumaturge Cat
data.description:
The contract has been fulfilled. Ultimate power
is within her grasp. But now she just works as a
theme park villain. 100% weakens non-Metal.

data.name: Hip Hop Cat
data.description:
Flunking student from a certain dance school.
Can be produced in masses. Flash Mob!
Might slow Red enemies.

data.name: Dancing Flasher Cat
data.description:
Someone you don't want to see on the street.
Dances skillfully to keep the game kid-friendly.
Might slow Red enemies.

data.name: Can Can Cat
data.description:
Kicked out of dance school for improvising
performances too provocative for family shows.
Sometimes slows movement of Red enemies.

data.name: Sushi Cat
data.description:
A Cat that moves fast by spinning.
The fresh meat can take a beating. (Area attack)
Reduced damage from Red, might weaken enemies.

data.name: Fried Shrimp Cat
data.description:
A Cat that moves fast by spinning.
Also got into Rock 'n' Roll (Area attack)
Reduced damage from Red, might weaken enemies.

data.name: Roe Cat
data.description:
Don't get all salty just because you'll lose!
Eggs-elent defense and Area Attack.
Resistant to Red, might weaken enemies.

data.name: Nerd Cat
data.description:
Completely fearless... until leaving his basement.
Net denizen who is famous for flaming.
Uber Long Distance attack specialist.

data.name: Hacker Cat
data.description:
Famous for making Big Red Buttons.
Graduate from an elite tech university.
Uber Long Distance attack specialist.

data.name: Cyberpunk Cat
data.description:
Having mastered virtual space, he's moved on
to losing his shirt in the cryptocurrency market.
Long-range area attacks slow non-Metal.

data.name: Kotatsu Cat
data.description:
Very effective in winter… not that it matters.
Damage from Floating enemies greatly reduced.
Might weaken Floating enemies.

data.name: Sadako Cat
data.description:
Hid in a TV to scare people for fun.
Was never able to get out. Haunts TVs now.
Resistant to + might weaken Floating.

data.name: Octopus Cat
data.description:
Extra-flexible Cat who feels most comfortable
in small, dark spaces. Cancels wave attacks.
Tough vs Floating, might weaken enemies.

data.name: Apple Cat
data.description:
Found a giant apple floating in a river.
Decided to use that as a costume.
Might stop Red Enemies.

data.name: Face Cat
data.description:
Found a giant head sitting on the road.
Decided to use that as a costume.
Might stop Red enemies.

data.name: iCat
data.description:
Found a colorful apple near Silicon
Valley while turtleneck shopping one day.
Area attacks 100% stop Red enemies.

data.name: Swimmer Cat
data.description:
Built from the pain of losing every race.
Obtained its strength from tears of defeat.
Deals massive damage to Floating enemies.

data.name: Butterfly Cat
data.description:
Managed to overcome the endless defeat with great effort.
Now blessed with victory!
Deals massive damage to Floating enemies.

data.name: Fishman Cat
data.description:
This one can barely even be called a Cat.
Submitted to gene therapy to become the world champion.
Extreme damage to Floating.

data.name: Bath Cat
data.description:
Likes to keep clean. All. The. Time.
Deals massive damage to Red enemies.

data.name: Sexy Bathtub Cat
data.description:
Likes to keep clean. All. The. Time.
Enjoys a quiet bath. Do Not Disturb.
Deals massive damage to Red enemies.

data.name: Luxury Bath Cat
data.description:
Bubbles and gold leaf make for an extra
decadent bathtime. Extra-powerful jets
do massive damage against dirty Red enemies.

data.name: Delinquent Cat
data.description:
Known as the Bancho of Cat School.
Might freeze Floating enemies (Area Attack)

data.name: Angry Delinquent Cat
data.description:
Throwing a fit of rage because his dad
ate his ice cream that was in the fridge.
Might freeze Floating enemies (Area Attack)

data.name: Ultra Delinquent Cat
data.description:
A naughty Cat known as king of the Angry Fist.
Loves pachinko, trades his winnings for ice cream.
Might freeze Floating/Relics (Area Attack)

data.name: Bodhisattva Cat
data.description:
A Cat that has reached a state of peace
and pushed its body beyond physical limits.
Might slow Floating enemies (Area Attack)

data.name: Avalokitesvara Cat
data.description:
A Bodhisattva Cat who has shown
compassion to many and all Battle Cats.
Might slow Floating enemies (Area Attack)

data.name: Tathagata Cat
data.description:
Enlightened compassion flows from this Cat.
But they say even the Buddha has a breaking
point. Area attacks might weaken/slow Floating.

data.name: Juliet Cat
data.description:
Dreams of a Romeo she met online.
Favorite book: 'Pride, Prejudice and Haircuts'
Briefly freezes Angels (Area Attack)

data.name: Princess Juliet Cat
data.description:
All grown up, but still dreaming of her
cyber-Romeo. Likes chicken kebabs.
Briefly freezes Angels (Area Attack)

data.name: Juliet The Maiko
data.description:
Romeo turned out to be a real jerk. Now aiming
for a total image change (and a cute samurai
lord). Briefly freezes Angels (Area Attack)

data.name: Weightlifter Cat
data.description:
Lifting heavy things is the height of manliness.
Supports 11 children, 7 wives and their parents.
Massive damage to Black enemies (Area Attack)

data.name: Ring Girl Cat
data.description:
Made it to the 12th round of life using her own
toughness and wits. Girl can't be stopped!
Massive damage to Black enemies (Area Attack)

data.name: Pizza Cat
data.description:
World's biggest junk-food fan who's about to get
a nasty surprise when he sees they forgot the
extra anchovies. Massive Area damage to Black.

data.name: Figure Skating Cats
data.description:
A stylish couple getting on board with the figure
skating craze. Only a month since they started.
No stopping these two lovers! (Area attack)

data.name: Drama Cats
data.description:
Skating's so last year, it's all about classical
theater now. Got the attention of the media, now
making old-school art cool again (Area Attack)

data.name: Slapstick Cats
data.description:
They stopped taking stagecraft so seriously and
now just want to bring laughter to the people.
Strong vs Relic enemies (Area Attack)

data.name: Cat Toaster
data.description:
Fed up with making toast every day, went on
strike by firing bread at Dad's face.
Might slow Angelic enemies. (Area Attack)

data.name: Cat Projector
data.description:
Used to projecting Hollywood stars, now worries
it might be obsolete thanks to digital video.
Might slow Angelic enemies. (Area Attack)

data.name: Catophone
data.description:
Melancholy melodies strip enemies of their will
to fight! Area attacks might slow Angelic
enemies and break Barriers!

data.name: Surfer Cat
data.description:
Spent so long hunting the perfect wave.
Now he's reached 40 without truly living life(?)
Might stop Aliens and survive lethal strikes. (Area)

data.name: Castaway Cat
data.description:
Says he wants to escape his desert island, but
he's secretly enjoying his permanent vacation.
Might stop Aliens and survive lethal strikes. (Area)

data.name: Seafarer Cat
data.description:
Giving up on rescue, he is now married to the sea.
Will the waves be kind or cruel today? Might stop
Aliens, will 100% survive one lethal strike. (Area)

data.name: Vaulter Cat
data.description:
Soaring through the blue sky using only a
single pole, she is the height of athleticism.
Area atks might slow Zombies.

data.name: Polevaulter Cat
data.description:
Certified by Guinness as the record-holder
for cats' polevaulting. Will marry her coach
next year. Area attacks might slow Zombies.

data.name: Housewife Cat
data.description:
Retired with four still-unbeaten world records.
Her skills are surprisingly applicable to daily life!
Long-range Area attacks might slow Zombies.

data.name: Fencer Cat
data.description:
Invincible swordscat unbeaten in 400 matches.
Has to use his left hand to actually feel
challenged. 100% chance of breaking Barriers.

data.name: Kendo Cat
data.description:
Decided to try a new form of swordplay, but
can't quite make the switch from his original
specialty. 100% chance of breaking Barriers.

data.name: the Kitty of Liberty
data.description:
Decided to try a new form of swordplay, but
can't quite make the switch from his original
specialty. 100% chance of breaking Barriers.

data.name: Nymph Cat
data.description:
Some rude 'hero' dropped his axes right in her pond.
No time for litterbugs, no matter how handsome they
might be! Long Range Area attacks.

data.name: Medalist Cat
data.description:
Somehow this Cat qualified for the tournament...
Somehow she won Gold. An investigation is
underway. Long-range Area attacks.

data.name: Fiend Cat
data.description:
Overcome by suffering, this warrior gave himself up
to the Aku and now butchers foes with twin axes.
Long-range Area attacks might Knockback Aku

data.name: Driller Cat
data.description:
The heart of the Grandon mining team,
his dream is to drill right to the Earth's core.
Long-range attacks Weaken Traitless enemies.

data.name: Power Driller Cat
data.description:
Digging specialist of the brave Grandon Cats.
His antenna is detecting a long-buried treasure!
Long-range attacks Weaken Traitless enemies.

data.name: Neo Driller Cat
data.description:
Digging specialist of the brave Grandon Cats.
New antenna for better treasure tracking?! Strong
vs Traitless, with Weakening Long-range attacks.

data.name: Piledriver Cat
data.description:
Drives stakes deep in the earth! She doesn't need
your permission, she'll hammer where she likes!
Tough & Knockback vs Zombies (Omni-Strike)

data.name: Power Piledriver Cat
data.description:
The rest of Grandon is a little scared of her.
Don’t like it? She'll put a stake right up your nose!
Tough & Knockback vs Zombies (Omni-Strike)

data.name: Neo Piledriver Cat
data.description:
Stake-driving specialist of the Grandon Corps.
Guides her points like a needle through thread.
Tough & Knockback vs Zombies! (Omni-Strike)

data.name: Cutter Cat
data.description:
Does double duty cutting and cooking for
the Grandon Cats. Huge Area damage vs Red,
Survives, gets stronger after taking damage.

data.name: Power Cutter Cat
data.description:
Gained a cutting-edge stove-top for more efficient
meal prep. Huge Area damage vs Red,
Survives, gets stronger after taking damage.

data.name: Neo Cutter Cat
data.description:
Cutting (and cooking) specialist of the Grandon Corps.
Supreme blue-collar flavor. Massive Area Damage vs
Red, 100% Survive, stronger after taking damage.

data.name: Backhoe Cat
data.description:
No one digs like this guy. Don't even try, you'll lose.
Only attacks Metal, with Critical chance!
Gains extra money when defeating enemies.

data.name: Power Backhoe Cat
data.description:
The way he picks up dirt is just... glorious.
Only attacks Metal, with Critical chance!
Gains extra money when defeating enemies!

data.name: Neo Backhoe Cat
data.description:
Digging the perfect hole is a divine act, he says.
Only attacks Metal, with Critical & Surge Attack!
Gains extra money when defeating enemies!

data.name: Miter Saw Cat
data.description:
The sawmaster-in-residence of Grandon.
Hates it when things aren't cut in half.
Massive Damage and Tough vs. Aliens!

data.name: Power Saw Cat
data.description:
t's so boring when there's nothing to cut...
The box has groceries for mommy in it.
Massive Damage and Tough vs. Aliens!

data.name: Neo Saw Cat
data.description:
Guru of the power saw, who has become one
with his machine. His potential is now limitless.
Massive Damage and Tough vs. Aliens!

data.name: Gold Cat
data.description:
Rolled in gold dust for a luxurious look.
...though it is just the same old Cat.
Exchange it for XP to level up other Cats!

data.name: Gold Macho Cat
data.description:
Rolled in gold dust for a luxurious look.
Says it aimed for the no-sleeve look
but painting its arms just slipped its mind.

data.name: Glittering Macho Cat
data.description:
Rolled in gold dust for a luxurious look.
Desiring for his splendor to be eternally untarnished,
he has become Immune to Wave attacks.

data.name: Neneko
data.description:
A kid sister type who dreams of stardom.
If only she had the guts to actually sing!
Admires Moneko. (Might perform Critical Attacks)

data.name: Miss NENEKO
data.description:
Made to perform despite her stage fright.
Still wants to sing but her voice won't come
out onstage. (Might perform Critical Attacks)

data.name: Cat Base Mini
data.description:
Who can say why, but this Cat has undergone
rigorous training to become a splendid fort.
His wave attack is actually just loud yelling.

data.name: Cat Base Jr
data.description:
Bought a cosplay helmet by mail order.
Likes to stalk strangers while pretending to be
a tower; his wave fires if he gets too excited.

data.name: Cat Base Ultra
data.description:
Through sheer willpower, transformed themself into
the ideal Cat Base with cutting-edge LAZERBEAMS!
Still makes pew-pew mouth noises when firing.

data.name: Metal Cat
data.description:
Metal skin reduces all damage taken to a minimum.
Alloy is only 87.5% purity, criticals might hurt him.
Can't upgrade to (+) levels. (Metal)

data.name: Metal Macho
data.description:
Metal skin reduces all damage taken to a minimum.
Proud of his beautiful skin, leaves his arms uncovered.
Can't upgrade to (+) levels. (Metal)

data.name: Freshman Cat Jobs
data.description:
A li'l smart aleck who aced his entrance exams
for Nyarvard U. Uses his wit to spy enemy weak
points and greatly decrease their offense.

data.name: Prof. Cat Jobs
data.description:
Won the Nyabel Prize in economics last year.
His debate skills can confuse enemies so badly
they lose much of their offensive power.

data.name: Headmaster Cat Jobs
data.description:
Legend of unmatched brainpower and experience.
Builds up incredible amounts of XP in his sleep!
Weakens enemies with Surge attacks

data.name: Sniper the Recruit
data.description:
Before the battlefield, boot camp. Only given
a potato gun, so don't expect TOO much knockback
from his super long-distance attack.

data.name: Sniper the Heavy
data.description:
A grim assassin who never fails a contract.
Still uses potato guns for the extra challenge.
Long distance atk. with non-metal knockback.

data.name: Sniper the Deadeye
data.description:
Free agent sniper, 31 years old, who bought all
their equipment secondhand off of Daveslist.
Long distance atk. with non-metal knockback.

data.name: Rich Cat III
data.description:
Heir of the legendary Rich Cat. Born wealthy,
still pinches every penny. Goes through the pockets
of defeated enemies for extra cash.

data.name: Rich Cat Sr.
data.description:
Father of the legendary Rich Cat. Got rich
by never spending profits from his small business.
Lives off of defeated enemies' pocket money.

data.name: Richest Cat
data.description:
Grandfather of the legendary Rich Cat. Invested
six dollars in NekoSoft two hundred years ago.
Every fallen enemy adds more $ to their account.

data.name: Ice Cat
data.description:
A cat was entranced by a girl
hailing from the Land of Ice. It is frozen.
Might freeze Red enemies. (Area Attack)

data.name: Ice Queen Cat
data.description:
Forgot to mention that the Cat is an
eternal icicle. Don't think it complains much.
Might freeze Red enemies. (Area Attack)

data.name: Ice Crystal Cat
data.description:
The Ice Queen's reign grows more secure,
and so does her Cat companion's crystal shell.
Freezes Red enemies in place (Area Attack).

data.name: Cat Machine
data.description:
Series 1 Weaponized Machine System (MS)
developed by the government (Area Attack)
Resitant to Red & Alien attacks.

data.name: Cat Machine Mk 2
data.description:
A battle-tested revision MS that managed to
escape from the research facility (Area Attack)
Resistant to Red & Alien attacks.

data.name: Cat Machine Mk 3
data.description:
The next generation of battle tech, MS:RX-Ω
has slipped into the hands of the Cat Army!
Resists Red/Alien attacks, immune to Waves.

data.name: Lesser Demon Cat
data.description:
A mad cat that sacrificed itself to a
a demon from the netherworld.
Attacks with extreme force.

data.name: Greater Demon Cat
data.description:
The mad cat managed to control
the demon from the netherworld.
Attacks with extreme force.

data.name: Greater Balrog Cat
data.description:
His wanderings through the abyss have
driven him mad with infernal ambitions.
Tremendous damage to a single enemy.

data.name: Marauder Cat
data.description:
Its cursed sword reduces the offensive power
but might deliver critical hits.
Known as the 'Metal Killer'.

data.name: Berserker Cat
data.description:
The cursed sword has taken over and
turned the Cat into the Cursed Knight.
Known as the 'Dark Metal Knight'. (Area Atk)

data.name: Paladin Cat
data.description:
This Cat's righteous heart finally conquered
the cursed sword, turning it into a holy axe.
Might critical attack. (Area Attack)

data.name: Baby Cat
data.description:
A baby Cat that still can't do anything
by itself. Luckily, daddy is there to help.
Might knockback Floating & Aliens (Area Atk)

data.name: Baby Cats
data.description:
Brought along it's baby sister.
Dad has his work cut out for him.
Might knockback Floating & Aliens (Area Atk)

data.name: Cats in the Cradle
data.description:
Even 7 kittens together can't do much…
Luckily Dad's still keeping an eye out for bullies.
Area wave attacks knockback Floating/Alien.

data.name: Cats in the Stroller
data.description:
With their powers combined, these babies are
out to change history. Omnistrikes unleash
Waves and might Knockback Floating/Aliens.

data.name: Nurse Cat
data.description:
Her warm smile and healing aura take away
the sting of her piercing syringe (Area attack)
Might knockback/slow Black/Floating enemies.

data.name: Heartful Nurse Cat
data.description:
A battlefield nurse saving lives with a syringe.
Defensive power/area increased (Area attack)
Might knockback/slow Black/Floating enemies.

data.name: Joyful Nurse Cat
data.description:
A beloved medic & veteran of many Cat
campaigns. Area attacks deliver vital medicine.
Might knockback/slow Black/Floating enemies.

data.name: Cat Clan Heroes
data.description:
A brave band of Cats out to defeat the King of Evil.
Long-Range Area strikes have chance of Critical.
100% chance to weaken Red, Black, and Floating.

data.name: Cat Guild Heroes
data.description:
The Chosen One and 11 courageous adventurers.
Long-Range Area strikes have chance of Critical.
100% chance to weaken Red, Black, and Floating.

data.name: Cat Quest Heroes
data.description:
Our adventurers take their quest to the skies!
Long-range Area strikes have chance of Critical.
100% Weaken vs Red, Black, Floating, Relics.

data.name: Lasvoss
data.description:
Incarnation of evil summoned to eradicate the forces
of Good. May strike a Savage Blow imbued with dark
power. Survives once, stronger after taking damage.

data.name: Ultimate Lasvoss
data.description:
His final form, revealed for the final confrontation with
the heroes. Smites adventurers with Savage Blows,
Survives once, stronger after taking damage.

data.name: Lasvoss Reborn
data.description:
Will arise only on the eve of the world's destruction.
Cloaked in darkness, his claws obliterate naive
heroes, leaving no trace of their pitiful existence.

data.name: Summoner Satoru
data.description:
To save the world, this boy made a pact with the Aku.
Commands dark minions for a good cause... for now.
Long-range Area attacks 100% Slow vs Aku

data.name: Dark Summoner Satoru
data.description:
Only a pure desire to save the world keeps Satoru
from being corrupted by the magic of the Aku pact.
Long-range Area attacks 100% Slow vs Aku

data.name: Devil Hunter Satoru
data.description:
Emerged in this world to subdue the Aku king. His
fight to protect the Cats begins now! Long-range
Area attacks 100% Knockback/Slow vs Aku

data.name: Cat Tengu
data.description:
Cat that endured all manner of difficult training in the
mountains to become a yokai. Colossus Slayer,
strong against Red/Angels, sometimes Knockback.

data.name: Grand Yokai Tengu
data.description:
Mysterious Cat that awoke its deepest mental faculties
with harsh training. Wields fire & wind. Colossus Slayer
strong against Red/Angels, sometimes Knockback.

data.name: Balaluga
data.description:
Not sure if this is a Cat…
There's just something about
that belly…

data.name: Balalan Pasalan
data.description:
No. Way. This can't be right…
Seems like this one freezes all
enemies in range.

data.name: Piccolan Pasalan
data.description:
A totally unknown extraterrestrial lifeform of
unimaginable power... or maybe just a weird Cat?
Freezes and weakens all enemies in area atk range.

data.name: Asiluga
data.description:
Not sure if this is a Cat...
There's just something about
those legs...

data.name: Asilan Pasalan
data.description:
Unbelievable, just unbelievable.
Seems like this one slows all
enemies in range.

data.name: Assassinlan Pasalan
data.description:
Is it a Cat? Or an overly melodramatic
comic-book assassin of some kind?
Slows enemies with Area Attacks.

data.name: Nekoluga
data.description:
Not sure if this is a Cat...
Maybe if you evolve him...

data.name: Unknown Cat
data.description:
God, I don't know if this is a Cat anymore.
Seriously, I give up.
Knockbacks enemies. (Area Atk.)

data.name: Ultralan Pasalan
data.description:
Tired of scaring children, Luga decided to reinvent
himself as that famous masked hero. Freezes
and knocks back non-Metal enemies (Area Atk.)

data.name: Tecoluga
data.description:
Not sure if this is a Cat...
There's just something about
those arms...

data.name: Tesalan Pasalan
data.description:
Are you kidding me?!
Seems like this one does massive damage
(sometimes critical) to just one enemy.

data.name: Lufalan Pasalan
data.description:
It seems like this one is a straw-hatted pirate
of some kind. But we really can't be sure.
Massive damage vs. one enemy. (Might Crit.)

data.name: Kubiluga
data.description:
Not sure if this is a Cat...
There's just something about
that neck...

data.name: Kubilan Pasalan
data.description:
You can't be serious. Really?!
Seems like this one knocks back
enemies from afar.

data.name: E. Kubilan Pasalan
data.description:
A mighty sumo wrestler who sharpened his
expert skills fighting on the streets.
Wave attacks with 100% Critical chance!

data.name: Togeluga
data.description:
Not sure if this is a Cat…
There's just something about
those… spikes???

data.name: Togelan Pasalan
data.description:
No. Way. This can't be right…
Survives one lethal strike, gets stronger the
more damage he takes. (Area Attack)

data.name: Shishilan Pasalan
data.description:
Ancient god who bridges the worlds of the living
and the dead. Survives once, grows stronger
as he takes more damage. (Area Attack)

data.name: Nobiluga
data.description:
Not sure if this is a Cat...
There's just something about
that cool 'stache...

data.name: Nobilan Pasalan
data.description:
I can't stand it anymore...
Seems like this one is immune to
Wave attacks. (Long Range Area Attack)

data.name: Mystican Pasalan
data.description:
Monster? Magician? ...Or just a Cat?
No one can explain how its powers work.
Immune to Wave attacks (Long-Range Area)

data.name: Papaluga
data.description:
Not sure if this is a Cat...
There's just something about
that toothless smile...

data.name: Papalan Pasalan
data.description:
Great googly moogly! Seems like this
mysterious old-timer has Area attacks
that 100% Curse non-Metal.

data.name: Sukelan Kakulan
data.description:
An average pensioner, or a mysterious force of
eldritch destruction? Best not to think about it.
100% Curse vs non-Metal, Immune to Surge Attacks.

data.name: Furiluga
data.description:
Not sure if this is a Cat...
There's just something about
those burning locks of hair...

data.name: Furilan Pasalan
data.description:
Can the world take any more of these?!
Seems like this one has Area attacks
that 100% Pierce and Barrier Break

data.name: Ragelan Pasalan
data.description:
They just keep coming!!!
Seems like this one can 100% Pierce and Barrier
Break, with Mini-Surge atk.

data.name: Kaoluga
data.description:
Not sure if this is a Cat...
There's just something about
that head-to-body proportion...

data.name: Kaolan Pasalan
data.description:
Someone tell me - how can this be?!
Seems like this one has 100% chance of
Mini-Surge with occasional Knockback.

data.name: Sanada Yukimura
data.description:
A famous warrior that was transformed by the
Legendary Cat Armour into a Bird-type General.
Deals massive damage to Black enemies.

data.name: Wargod Yukimura
data.description:
Activated the armour's hidden function
Jet Boosters. No stopping it now!
Deals massive damage to Black enemies.

data.name: Immortal Yukimura
data.description:
Crimson wings carry this wargod through the
front lines, tearing them apart without mercy!
Deals massive damage to Black enemies.

data.name: Maeda Keiji
data.description:
A warrior that was transformed by the Legendary
Cat Armour into a Tiger-type General. (Area Attack)
Resistant to Black, more damage when hurt.

data.name: Wargod Keiji
data.description:
The Legendary Cat Armor evolved and sprouted
a Cherry Tree from his head (Area Attack)
Resistant to Black, more damage when hurt.

data.name: Immortal Keiji
data.description:
As the cherries blossom, so does Keiji's battle fury.
Resistant to Black, immune to Wave attacks. Area
attacks grow stronger as he takes damage.

data.name: Oda Nobunaga
Wargod Nobunaga
data.description:
The Cat's spirit goes into overdrive.
The grudge grows even stronger. (Area Attack)
100% chance to Freeze Black enemies.

data.name: Immortal Nobunaga
data.description:
Leads an army of vengeful spirits to fulfill his
dream of unifying the heavens and the netherworld.
100% chance to Freeze Black enemies. (Area)

data.name: Phantasmal Nobunaga
data.description:
The enmity of those that he has slain powers his
burning ambition to rule both heaven and hell.
100% Freeze to Black, Aku. Counter-Surge (Area)

data.name: Takeda Shingen
data.description:
A master tactician of overwhelming power
who is cursed by the Legendary Cat Sword.
Area attacks only damage Black/Aliens.

data.name: Wargod Shingen
data.description:
Cat Sword's Tactics Mode - activate!
Even greater destructive power!
Area attacks only damage Black/Aliens.

data.name: Immortal Shingen
data.description:
The Cat Sword's path of destruction
is unstoppable. There is no mercy to be given.
Area attacks only damage Black/Aliens.

data.name: Date Masamune
data.description:
The curse of the Legendary Cat Shield
has made him a killing machine. (Area Attack)
Might knockback Black and Red enemies.

data.name: Wargod Masamune
data.description:
Cat Shield's Hell Mode - activate!
Infernal (Area) attacks slice through his foes!
Might knockback Black and Red enemies.

data.name: Immortal Masamune
data.description:
Infernal hatred has fully infused the Shield.
Karmic blades sweep through all enemies!
Area atks. knockback Black and Red enemies.

data.name: Uesugi Kenshin
data.description:
Transformed into a dragon through the cursed
magic of the Nyanko Engine. (Area attack)
Strong + 100% knockback against Black.

data.name: Wargod Kenshin
data.description:
Deciding to fully fuse with the Nyanko Engine,
the great general gave in to darkness (Area att.)
Strong + 100% knockback against Black.

data.name: Immortal Kenshin
data.description:
Totally consumed by corruption. The only emotion
remaining is the will to destruction. (Area Attacks)
Strong vs + 100% knockback against Black.

data.name: Imagawa Yoshimoto
data.description:
His impeccable virtue allows him to wield
the cursed Cat Fan. Strong against Black,
100% chance to weaken (Long-range)

data.name: Wargod Yoshimoto
data.description:
Possessed by an all-knowing fox spirit, he
strikes with golden arrows. Strong vs Black,
100% chance to weaken (Long-range)

data.name: Immortal Yoshimoto
data.description:
Stained crimson with the blood of his rivals, the
Cat Fan burns with an unearthly fire for even greater
damage and weakening against Black enemies.

data.name: Narita Kaihime
data.description:
This stunning warrior has been blessed with
an invincible blade and a resolute body.
Slows Black/Zombies, might strike Savage blows.

data.name: Wargod Kaihime
data.description:
Incomparable beauty who mercilessly destroys
foes while maintaining perfect composure in battle.
Slows Black/Zombies, might strike Savage blows.

data.name: Immortal Kaihime
data.description:
This dignified heroine has withstood the corruption
of the cursed weapons and seeks only to bring peace.
100% Slow vs Black/Zombies, chance of Savage blows.

data.name: Shiro Amakusa
data.description:
Clockwork creation imbued with a young zealot's
soul. Driven to bloody battle for his righteous cause.
Massive Area damage vs Aku and Black enemies.

data.name: Wargod Amakusa
data.description:
His endless crusade has stained his own spirit,
turning him into a vengeful wraith of slaughter.
Massive Area damage vs Aku and Black enemies.

data.name: Immortal Amakusa
data.description:
Embodiment of grudges and rage on the battlefield.
Houses vengeful hellfire that will bring the world to ruin.
Massive Area damage vs Aku and Black enemies.

data.name: Hattori Hanzo
data.description:
Ninja transformed into a panther by a cursed iaito. One
swift strike, and the mission is complete. Colossus
Slayer, Massive damage to Black/Floating, 100% Freeze.

data.name: Wargod Hanzo
data.description:
Peerless assassin who cuts down targets with godspeed,
unleashing the power of his cursed blade. Colossus
Slayer, massive damage to Black/Floating, 100% Freeze.

data.name: Akechi Mitsuhide
data.description:
Acclaimed general transformed into a heartless
warlord by the curse of the Legendary Rifle.
Conjurer, 100% Knockback vs Angels/Black enemies.

data.name: Wargod Mitsuhide
data.description:
Driven by the curse of the Legendary Rifle to shoot
anything that crosses their sights. Knockback vs Angels/
Black enemies, with chance of Surge Attack. Conjurer.

data.name: Windy
data.description:
A galaxy girl who manipulates wind.
Her vacuum cannon cleans enemies from a distance
Massive damage to Floating enemies. (Area Attack)

data.name: Windy Type α
data.description:
This strange girl can hear the wind whispering.
The wind tells her that it is in pain...
Massive damage to Floating enemies. (Area Attack)

data.name: Divine Windy
data.description:
Has a bad habit of impulse buying the latest mechas.
Neo-Vacuum Cannon blasts from long-distance.
Massive damage to Floating enemies. (Area Attack)

data.name: Ultimate Windy
data.description:
Her hair sometimes gets sucked into her mecha.
Fires her Vacuum Cannon Mk 2 from long distance
to deal massive Area Attack damage to Floating.

data.name: Thundia
data.description:
A galaxy girl who can manipulate electricity.
Brings down bolts from a distance.
Massive damage to Red enemies. (Area Attack)

data.name: Thundia Type β
data.description:
Always worries about her chronic neck pain.
Likes watching cartoons in her spare time.
Massive damage to Red enemies. (Area Attack)

data.name: Divine Thundia
data.description:
When you have a goddess' body, it's tough to find
clothes that fit. Long distance Area Attacks
deliver massive damage to Red enemies.

data.name: Kuu
data.description:
Zealous user of strange witchcraft to control
her staff for great damage from a distance.
Strong against Black/Red enemies. (Area Attack)

data.name: Kuu Type γ
data.description:
Zealous user of strange witchcraft.
Not good with men, ends with verbal abuse.
Strong against Black/Red enemies. (Area Attack)

data.name: Divine Kuu
data.description:
Treat her like a weakling and you'll know true pain.
Your apologies will only make the staff smash down
harder. Strong against Red/Black (Area Attack).

data.name: Kai
data.description:
Airheaded girl riding her machine pig 'Tonton'.
Fires powerful point blank beams (Area Attack).
Reduced damage from Floating, survives once.

data.name: Kai Type μ
data.description:
Ends up liking anyone who is nice to her.
Her love hurdle is mere 3cm (Area Attack).
Reduced damage from Floating, survives once.

data.name: Divine Kai
data.description:
If any cute guy is your type, is that really a type?
Always travels via her trusty Boarborg (Area Atk)
Reduced damage from Flying, Survives Once.

data.name: Coppermine
data.description:
Magical beauty powered by her staff
Releases beams of light (Area Attack)
Might freeze floating enemies.

data.name: Coppermine Type κ
data.description:
Doesn't smile that often. (Area Attack)
In front of cats, however.. different story.
Might stop floating enemies.

data.name: Divine Coppermine
data.description:
What can you do for her that her favorite
Cat doesn't already? Come back in 100
years, kid. Might stop Floating (Area Attack)

data.name: Kalisa
data.description:
Almost obliterated her school on the first
day of class with her sword's dark magic.
Massive damage against Angels. (Area Attack)

data.name: Kalisa Type χ
data.description:
Banished her principal to the netherworld at the
graduation ceremony. Things never change.
Massive damage against Angels. (Area Attack)

data.name: Divine Kalisa
data.description:
All of the nice boys who confess their love to her
soon find themselves 'graduated' to the next world.
Massive damage against Angels (Area Attack)

data.name: Twinstars
data.description:
The two purehearted sisters, Cici and Koma.
Divine breath controls their mighty mecha claws.
Massive area damage to Aliens/Black.

data.name: Twinstars Type Φ
data.description:
The mechanical catpaws 'AH' and 'UN' sweetly
sweep away any threat to these cutie-pie demigods.
Massive area damage to Aliens/Black.

data.name: Divine Twinstars
data.description:
Undisputed masters of the coordinated assault.
They skipped detention today to join the battle!
Massive area damage to Aliens/Black.

data.name: Myrcia
data.description:
Money couldn't buy happiness, but it bought a small
arsenal that very much brings a smile to her face.
Wave Attacks, might dodge Traitless enemy attacks.

data.name: Myrcia Type ξ
data.description:
RoboButler is endlessly apologizing for Myr's rich-girl
faux pas (and the trail of destruction left in her wake).
Wave Attacks, might dodge Traitless enemy attacks.

data.name: Divine Myrcia
data.description:
Bourgeois space princess living a high-class life,
but can't resist cravings for cheap cheeseburgers.
Wave attacks, might dodge Traitless enemy attacks.

data.name: Lilin
data.description:
This mad researcher experimented on her own
classmates to synthesize the vile Mateki elixir.
Strong vs Angels & Aku, with Piercing attacks.

data.name: Lilin π
data.description:
Made a pact with the evil Aku to attain the ultimate
Mateki formula and enslave the entire Academy.
Strong vs Angels & Aku, with 100% Piercing attacks.

data.name: Divine Lilin π
data.description:
A madwoman who creates elixirs to enslave demons.
Gazes on calamity and chaos with a bewitching grin.
Strong vs Angels & Aku, with 100% Piercing attacks.

data.name: Huntress Terun
data.description:
Invited along on a hunt, her life was forever changed.
Hounds her prey with blasts from her Lightning Bow.
Colossus Slayer, Area Attacks Slow Red/Aliens

data.name: Huntress Terun ζ
data.description:
Supernaturally calm and clever, she strikes without
fail at the weakest point of her gargantuan quarry.
Colossus Slayer, Area Attacks Slow Red/Aliens

data.name: Divine Huntress Terun ζ
data.description:
Intelligent hunter who hunts gigantic prey without
sleep or food, almost never fainting from hunger.
Colossus Slayer, Strong against Red/Aliens.

data.name: Pegasa
data.description:
Daughter of a noble house, born frail of body but
capably wielding precision lasers to keep enemies
at bay. Conjurer, Weakens Floating and Zombies.

data.name: Pegasa ν
data.description:
Uninterested in the plots and schemes of adults,
she admirably fulfills her duty while longing for
freedom. Conjurer, Weakens Floating/Zombies.

data.name: Megidora
data.description:
An awakened Ancient Cat Dragon.
Created to purify the world (Area Attack)
Might knockback and slow Floating enemies.

data.name: Holy Dragon Megidora
data.description:
An awakened Ancient Cat Dragon.
Megidora shifts to final Dragon form (Area Attack)
Might knockback and slow Floating enemies.

data.name: God-Emperor Megidora
data.description:
Possessor of the Divine Dragon Stone. Ready to
devour all to maintain its imperial throne.
Area attacks might slow Floating enemies.

data.name: Sodom
data.description:
An awakened Ancient Cat Dragon.
Leaves destruction in its wake (Area Attack)
Might knockback/resistant to Floating.

data.name: Earth King Sodom
data.description:
An awakened Ancient Cat Dragon Weapon.
Shifted to his final Dragon form (Area Attack)
Might knockback/resistant to Floating.

data.name: God-Emperor Sodom
data.description:
Sodom unlocked his FINAL final Dragon form,
rending the very earth asunder with his power!
100% area knockback/resistant vs Floating.

data.name: Raiden
data.description:
An Ancient Anti Cat Dragon weapon.
Lays down a hail of deadly bullets.
100% Area Knockback vs Red Enemies.

data.name: Dragonslayer Raiden
data.description:
An Ancient Anti Cat Dragon weapon.
Raiden forcefully set to overdrive.
100% Area Knockback vs Red Enemies.

data.name: God-Emperor Raiden
data.description:
Overdrive has released Raiden's almighty power.
Nothing can withstand the blast of his holy beam.
Strong vs. / 100% Area Knockback vs Red.

data.name: Vars
data.description:
Legendary Dragon Knight Vars. (Area Attack)
Has rode over a thousand dragons.
Might knockback and slow black enemies.

data.name: Dragon King Vars
data.description:
Legendary Dragon Knight Vars. (Area Attack)
Vars now unleashes all of his power.
Might knock back and slow black enemies.

data.name: God-Emperor Vars
data.description:
Legendary Knight who has mastered even the
most savage mount to rain down Area Attacks.
Might knockback and slow black enemies.

data.name: Kamukura
data.description:
Ancient Cat Dragon Kamukura. (Area Attack)
Said to be able to move the heavens.
Might knockback and slow Red enemies.

data.name: God Dragon Kamukura
data.description:
Ancient Cat Dragon Kamukura. (Area Attack)
Shifted to true form after collecting 7 balls.
Might knockback and slow Red enemies.

data.name: God-Emperor Kamukura
data.description:
Ancient Cat Dragon who has awakened the
hidden power of the 7 mystic balls.
Might knockback and slow Red enemies.

data.name: Dioramos
data.description:
This dragon lord seeks to set it all ablaze.
Lay waste with epically mighty area attacks.
Might knockback and slow Angels.

data.name: Archdragon Dioramos
data.description:
An ancient dragon of unquestioned authority.
Lay waste with epically mighty area attacks.
Might knockback and slow Angels.

data.name: God-Emperor Dioramos
data.description:
Brutal attacks powered by hate - a family
tradition of mercilessness. 100% Barrier break,
plus Knockback & Slow vs Angels (Area Atk)

data.name: Ascendant Dioramos
data.description:
The heat of 1000 suns radiates from the core of
this engine of total ruin, leaving nothing in its wake.
100% Knockback/Slow to Angels/Aliens

data.name: Ganglion
data.description:
First emperor and founder of the Dragon dynasty.
Who knows what overwhelming power he holds?
Long-range attacks, strong vs Aliens and Zombies.

data.name: Ganglion the Ancient
data.description:
Has cultivated his strength for millennia, only
growing ever more powerful in his old age.
Long-range attacks, strong vs Aliens and Zombies.

data.name: Ganglion the Unleashed
data.description:
An unholy relic has undone the seals that kept his
true might in check. Resist and meet your doom.
Long-range attacks, strong vs Aliens and Zombies.

data.name: Relentless Gladios
data.description:
Gargantuan horned beast, spitting vicious
thunderbolts that shake the very firmament.
Chance to Knockback/Slow Traitless enemies.

data.name: Gladios the Annihilator
data.description:
None may stand against the horned king bearing
the soul of storms and impenetrable ebony armor.
Chance to Knockback/Slow Traitless enemies.

data.name: God-Emperor Gladios
data.description:
Bathed in the light of the Obliteration at a holy mountain
and realised the power to destroy all life. (Area Atk)
100% Chance to Knockback/Slow Traitless.

data.name: Hevijak the Wicked
data.description:
Foul dragon, born of miasma and destined to bring
disaster and utter destruction to foolish mortal foes.
Tough vs Red and Aku, chance of Knockback/Piercing.

data.name: Wicked King Hevijak
data.description:
Given the overwhelming power to annihilate the
celestial kingdom through dark pacts with the Aku.
Tough vs Red and Aku, chance of Knockback/Piercing.

data.name: God-Emperor Hevijak
data.description:
A dark dragon that has taken dark light into itself. Its
fire has laid waste to many worlds. Tough vs Aku/Red,
with 100% Knockback and chance of Shield Piercing.

data.name: Sea Serpent Daliasan
data.description:
A dragon that ruled over the seas long ago under the
Gods' watch. Destroys foes with overwhelming power.
Area attacks Slow Floating/Angels, Colossus Slayer.

data.name: Sea King Daliasan
data.description:
A dragon housing the unrelenting power of the raging
seas. Destroys foes with overwhelming power.
Area attacks Slow Floating/Angels, Colossus Slayer.

data.name: Gunduros
data.description:
Dragon created to bring an end to a great ancient war.
Conjurer, Sage Slayer, deals Massive damage to Aliens
and Black enemies, with a chance to Slow/Knockback.

data.name: Ballistic Dragon Gunduros
data.description:
Legendary dragon that laid waste to an entire ancient
civilization in one night. Conjurer, Sage Slayer, Massive
damage to Aliens/Black, 100% Knockback/Slow.

data.name: Momotaro
data.description:
On a quest to find anyone stronger than him.
Aim for the top! Watch the fans...
Might freeze Angel/Red enemies. (Area attack).

data.name: The Peach Angels
data.description:
A road gang of wild cats who realized that
effort and results are two different things.
Might freeze Angel/Red enemies. (Area attack)

data.name: The Peach Devils
data.description:
Ends may not justify the means,
but they definitively justify owning a sweet ride.
Might freeze Angel/Red enemies. (Area attack)

data.name: Urashima Taro
data.description:
Elite Cat agent that holds the secret of the
government bioweapon T.U.R.T.L.E. (Area Atk)
Resistant to Black/Angel attacks.

data.name: Guardian Gamereon
data.description:
A super-powerful T.U.R.T.L.E. enhanced by
the top-secret T-VIRUS (Area Attack)
Resistant to Black/Angel attacks.

data.name: King Gamereon
data.description:
To impress his crush at the secret lab, made
some bold new fashion choices (and bought
donuts). Resistant to Black/Angel attacks.

data.name: The Grateful Crane
data.description:
Champion of this year's Bird-Cat contest
held at the lake every year. (Area Attack)
Might knockback Floating/Angel enemies.

data.name: Super Galaxy Cosmo
data.description:
Pushed its limits further to reach space.
Evolved by collecting Star Energy. (Area Atk)
100% knockback vs Floating/Angels.

data.name: Ultima Galaxy Cosmo
data.description:
He has reached the edge of the universe and
seen the truth. Area attacks have 100% chance
of knockback & freeze vs Floating/Angels.

data.name: Kasa Jizo
data.description:
It's said there's a shadowy organization who
grants wishes made to these statues. (Area Atk)
Deals massive damages to Black/Angel types.

data.name: Jizo's Moving Castle
data.description:
The hidden fortress of the Jizo organization.
...wait isn't this classified? (Area Attack)
Deals massive damages to Black/Angel types.

data.name: Jizo's Mega-Castle
data.description:
Escaping the government’s tactical missile strikes,
the Jizo Organization is on the offensive. (Area Atk)
Deals massive damage to Black/Angel types.

data.name: Princess Kaguya
data.description:
Beautiful Cat on assignment from the Moon.
Her true nature is still top secret...
Might slow Angel/Metal enemies. (Area Atk)

data.name: The Death Moon
data.description:
A prototype of one of many Ancient Cat
Weapons made from stolen blueprints.
Might slow Angel/Metal enemies. (Area Atk)

data.name: The Chaos Moon
data.description:
Almost annihilated the galaxy once... Oops.
That can happens when you design an AI with
no conscience. Slows Angels/Metal (Area Atk)

data.name: Ultra Kaguya
data.description:
As a royal of the moon kingdom, singlehandedly
ended a grueling space war. Metal Killer, Area
Attacks might Slow Angels and Metal enemies.

data.name: Kachi-Kachi
data.description:
Cat Army R&D cloned an ancient superweapon:
a cute Tanuki that can survive being set on fire...
Might weaken Alien/Angel attacks. (Area Attack)

data.name: Fire Squad Kachiyama
data.description:
Communing with ancient spirits, Kachi now gathers
all the heat he has absorbed for explosive assaults!
Weakens Alien/Angel attacks. (Area Attack)

data.name: Kachiyama Assault Brigade
data.description:
Ancient magic empowered by modern technology.
Burn it all down and leave no evidence behind!
Weakens Alien/Angel attacks. (Area Attack)

data.name: Sarukani
data.description:
Won best supporting actor as a li'l monkey for
'Selfish Persimmons'. Everyone hates working
with him. Strong area atk vs Angels/Zombies.

data.name: Rock Revengers
data.description:
The kids Sarukani did wrong formed the metal

heavy. Strong area atk vs Angels/Zombies.

data.name: The One-Hit Wonders
data.description:
Saru convinced the rockers to reform the
band to try to capitalize on every pop trend
at once. Strong area atk vs Angels/Zombies.

data.name: Kintaro
data.description:
Young exec at AxeCorp, managing operations
at the mountain office with intern Li'l Bear.
Might Slow Angels and strike a Savage Blow.

data.name: Kinrangers RoboForce
data.description:
Gathered the whole Beast Division for a unified
fight against a very hostile acquisition attempt.
Might Slow Angels and strike a Savage Blow.

data.name: Kinrangers GigaForce
data.description:
Beast Division Elites with upgraded tech to better
defend the stock portfolios of the future. Long-Range
Area atk. might Slow/Curse Angels, with Savage Blow.

data.name: Shitakiri Sparrow
data.description:
Treasure hunter who 'discovered' a haunted
chest in a sparrow's mansion. Mini-Wave, with
chance of Knockback/Curse vs Aku/Angels

data.name: Chunchun Haunters
data.description:
Ghost hunters partnering with chest-bound spirits to
capture yokai with a high tech ecto-net. Chance of
Mini-Wave, 100% Knockback/Curse vs Aku/Angels

data.name: Grand Chunchun Haunters
data.description:
Ghost hunters making fat stacks from their job.
Capture ghosts with their state-of-the-art equipment.
Mini-Wave, 100% Knockback/Curse vs Aku/Angels.

data.name: Issun Boshi
data.description:
A travelling acupuncturist Cat who's an agent on a
mission to infiltrate and destroy a large organization.
Deals Massive damage to Traitless and Angels.

data.name: Oni Landshaker Kozuchimaru
data.description:
A skilled agent who rescued a beautiful spy from the
organization ONI and escaped with their submarine.
Deals Massive damage to Traitless and Angels.

data.name: Akira
data.description:
A super-genius who dreamed of alien invasion.
Recreated himself as a cyborg hero to defend
the planet! Area attacks might freeze Aliens.

data.name: Shadow Akira
data.description:
A bullied kid who hid in his room for years. No more!
Now channels his fear into fighting for justice!
Attack power increases when damaged! (Area)

data.name: Inferno Akira
data.description:
Reinventing himself, he has changed his destiny!
But can he change society with his powers?
Strong vs. Aliens, immune to wave attacks.

data.name: Catman
data.description:
Wears a special suit that blocks all UV light,
but it can't stop the papparazzi from following...
Massive area damage against Floating/Aliens.

data.name: Dark Catman
data.description:
Became a monster to fight the terrors of the night.
Still, weak to autograph requests from nice old ladies.
Massive area damage against Angels/Aliens.

data.name: Ultimate Catman
data.description:
Gave in and took a three-movie deal to afford a
high-tech suit powered by the fear of evildoers.
Massive Area damage to Aliens and Relics.

data.name: Mekako Saionji
data.description:
Studied back issues of Mechanix Monthly to
build the unstoppable killing machine of her dreams.
Resistant to Alien/Black. Survives one lethal strike.

data.name: Dr. Mekako
data.description:
Broke into an airport and took apart a jet engine
overnight to get parts for her mecha masterpiece.
Magnifique. Knockback + Weaken against Aliens.

data.name: Mission Control Mekako
data.description:
Recruited by NYASA to engineer mechs for
deep-space recon. Astrophysics? No sweat.
Massive area damage + Slow vs Aliens.

data.name: The White Rabbit
data.description:
A notorious spy who insists on cosplaying during
every heist. She's never failed a mission, though...
100% chance of slowing Alien/Red. (Area Attack)

data.name: The Black Cat
data.description:
Operative of the infamous Cat assassin's guild, there
and gone without a single trace. Delivers pizza as a
cover. Strong area damage against Alien/Red.

data.name: The Grey Fox
data.description:
Commander of the F.O.X. intelligence agency,
she ruthlessly directs a global network of expert
killers. Area atks knockback+weaken Alien/Red.

data.name: The Spectral Cat
data.description:
Wears many masks in pursuit of those that would
disturb the peace. Strong against, Slows and Weakens
Aliens and Red with Area Attacks. Sage Slayer.

data.name: Warlock and Pierre
data.description:
A precocious young sorcerer who has enslaved
a nightmare. Its infernal powers deliver massive
damage only to Aliens, Floating and enemy bases.

data.name: Dark Merchant Babil
data.description:
With his nightmare's true form revealed, they now
journey collecting wicked souls. Huge damage only to
Angel/Alien, gets big money for each enemy defeat.

data.name: Mad Doctor Klay
data.description:
Picked up an online degree in occult anatomy. 1st
attempt at a soul transplant: GREAT SUCCESS!(?)
Delivers extreme damage, but only to Aliens/bases!

data.name: Hayabusa
data.description:
Seals away evil with his clan's mystic blade.
The way of the Ninja knows no mercy.
Long Distance, Area Attacks, Critical Attacks.

data.name: Oni Hayabusa
data.description:
The otherworldly power in his chest now threatens
to consume him. To destroy evil, will he lose his soul?
Long Area Attacks, Knockback & Slow vs Aliens.

data.name: Akuma Hayabusa
data.description:
Cybernetically enhanced his demon's power with an
experimental Inferno Engine replacing his heart.
Long Area Attacks, Knockback & Slow vs Zombies.

data.name: Detective Vigler
data.description:
Prodigy in the netherworld's Office of Infernal
Investigations, with just over 665 cases solved.
Wave attacks might freeze Aliens/Floating.

data.name: Inspector Gabriel
data.description:
This hardened veteran got too close to the truth
and uncovered a conspiracy scarier than hell itself.
Wave attacks might freeze Aliens/Zombies.

data.name: Section Chief Gravicci
data.description:
Realized his true power after bringing the corrupt
archdemons to justice. Time for the final judgment!
Wave attacks 100% Freeze Zombies.

data.name: Sharpshooter Saki
data.description:
A sniper prodigy small but effective.

Long-range attacks only hit Aliens & Red.

data.name: Nighthunter Saki
data.description:
The watchful guardian over the night city.
Genius with a rifle who still has to help Mom with the dishes.
Long-range attacks only hit Aliens & Zombies.

data.name: Bad Blaster Saki
data.description:
Too many contracts means she always cancels on
her friends. Can upgraded gear save her social life?
Long-range attacks only hit Alien & Relics.

data.name: White Knight Cyclops
data.description:
Demon-slaying guardian of the innocent, wielding
holy lightning to annihilate those born of darkness.
Might Freeze Aku/Aliens, with Shield Piercing

data.name: Black Knight Kyklops
data.description:
Ferocious crusader who sacrificed his body to
the Aku in exchange for the absolute power to

data.description:
Corrupted knight driven by both dark desire and
righteous heart to wield his sacred mace in endless
battle. Massive damage to Aku, with Shield Piercing.

High schooler with the power to drop lightning on foes.

bolt. Might Knockback Angels and Aliens.

electricity. Solves the 7 mysteries of his school in the

data.name: Thunder God Zeus

The highest authority among the old gods

data.name: The Majestic Zeus
data.description:
Empowered by divine fury, his might grows
ever more! His Heavenly Blade reduces existence

data.name: Almighty Zeus
data.description:
Inheritor of Mana's blessing, wields the power
of the fruit of creation to create the new paradise.

data.name: Anubis the Protector
data.description:
God of Death who escorts human souls to the
underworld. His Nether Staff purges mortals of

data.name: Anubis the Unblemished
data.description:
His dominance of the underworld is complete.

any life. Unharmed by wave attacks. (Area Attack)

data.name: Almighty Anubis
data.description:
God of Death who uses the fruit of creation to sever

data.name: Radiant Aphrodite

Deity of beauty, pride, love and... other stuff.

data.name: Megaphrodite

Her Brilliant Bow can grant long life, or take it all

data.name: Almighty Aphrodite
data.description:
Goddess of love, beauty, and pride. Blessed by the
fruit of creation, life and death serve her pleasure.

data.name: Shining Amaterasu
data.description:
The might and beauty of the Sun personified.

Massive area damage to any enemy with a trait.

data.name: Glorious Amaterasu
data.description:
No one can stand against the radiance of this
goddess. Dark souls kneel before her holy mirror!
Massive area damage to any enemy with a trait.

data.name: Almighty Amaterasu
data.description:
Merciful goddess who uses the powers of the fruit
of creation to bless the earth with the light of the Sun.
Massive Area damage to any enemy with a trait.

data.name: Splendid Ganesha
data.description:
Lord of scholarship and splendor, guardian of the
sacred treasures that ward against misfortune.

data.name: Exalted Ganesha
data.description:
All who follow him will grow prosperous and wise,

data.name: Almighty Ganesha
data.description:
The god of prosperity who uses the fruit of creation
to bless mankind with wealth, wisdom and fortune.

data.name: Wrathful Poseidon

Master of storms and seas, one of the 12

data.name: Valiant Poseidon
data.description:
Undisputed lord of the waters. Can command
sea serpents to obliterate those who defy him.

data.name: Almighty Poseidon
data.description:
Lord of the seas, who wields the powers of the
fruit of creation to bring order to the wind and waves.
Area attack 100% freezes Zombies/Metal foes.

data.name: Empress Chronos
data.description:
An almighty titaness who rescued the universe from

data.name: Chronos the Infinite
data.description:
Molded our reality from primordial matter using her
mastery of the Divine Timepiece. Don't mess with her.
