data.name: Almighty Chronos
data.description:
With the power of the fruit of creation, holds back
the chaos that threatens to consume the universe.
Long-Range Area attacks Freeze Traited enemies.

data.name: Hades the Punisher
data.description:
Supreme overlord and judge of the dead.
Condemns evil souls with his infernal scythe.
Immune to Toxic & Warp (Area Attack)

data.name: Hades the Deathdealer
data.description:
Ruler of the underworld who reaps the spirits
of sinners, bringing them to their ultimate fate.
Immune to Toxic & Warp (Area Attack)

data.name: Almighty Hades
data.description:
Ruler of the nether realms, who uses the fruit of
creation to draw the sinful dead to his kingdom.
Immune to Toxic & Warp (Area Attack)

data.name: Lucifer the Fallen
data.description:
Expelled after attempting to acquire forbidden powers.
Annihilates opponents with his fallen angel's Hell Blade.
Strong vs. Floating/Aku. Chance of Surge Attack.

data.name: Grand Lucifer
data.description:
Enemy of heaven and commander of demon legions.
Creates a dark world with his Unholy Hell Blade.
Strong vs. Floating/Aku. Chance of Surge Attack.

data.name: Almighty Lucifer
data.description:
Grand demon of Hell plotting the overthrow of Heaven.
Shepards the living to sin with the Fruit of Creation.
Strong vs. Floating/Aku. 100% Surge Attack.

data.name: Lightmother Aset
data.description:
One of the nine gods of Heliopolis with unparalleled
magic power, raining judgment down with Wings of Life
and Death. Colossus Slayer, chance of Wave atk.

data.name: Nefer Aset
data.description:
One of the nine gods of Heliopolis with unmatched
arcane power, purifying evil with Godly Wings of Life
and Death. Colossus Slayer, 100% Wave Attack.

data.name: Mighty Kat-A-Pult
data.description:
The spunky interns of Cat Corps of Engineers
built an awesome land weapon! Powerful
anti-Zombie long range attacks, might weaken!

data.name: CAT-6 Siege Engine
data.description:
Featuring thick armor, an arsenal of long-range
cannons, and loaded with shock troops, CAT-6
is tough vs Zombies and weakens enemies.

data.name: CAT-8 Behemoth
data.description:
The culmination of centuries of feline technology,
this near-indestructable superweight tank has high
defense vs Zombies and weakens enemies.

data.name: CAT-10 Gigapult
data.description:
Overwhelms all land-based foes to seize victory.
Goal of this Panzer Mark IV: Unending prosperity.
Resists Zombie/Relic. Long-range area atks Weaken.

data.name: Mighty Bomburr
data.description:
The spunky interns of Cat Corps of Engineers
built a super sweet tactical aircraft. Area atks
knock back Zombie enemies with ease.

data.name: NEK-0 Sky Fortress
data.description:
The ultimate aerial threat, dropping endless
megatons of munition on ground threats. Area
attacks deliver powerful knockback vs Zombies.

data.name: NEK-02 Air Citadel
data.description:
A force of total aerial domination and a key weapon
in the Cat's quest to create an ideal world.
Area attacks have powerful knockback vs Zombies.

data.name: Mighty Drednot
data.description:
The spunky interns of Cat Corps of Engineers
built a retro battleship for marine dominance!
Area atks deliver huge damage vs Red enemies.

data.name: B.C.S. Lionheart
data.description:
Boasting a complement of elite marines and a
drill able to punch through any hull, the Lionheart
delivers huge area damage vs Reds and Zombies.

data.name: B.C.S. Tigerclaw
data.description:
Cat Army Special Forces use this Nekonium drill-
equipped destroyer to stage marine assaults.
Huge area damage vs Reds and Zombies.

data.name: Mighty Rekon Korps
data.description:
Highly mobile artillery unit based on ancient
engineering. Only attacks enemies with traits,
but deals massive area damage with each strike.

data.name: Orbital Platform Armageddon
data.description:
Designed to control interstellar territory using
wormhole physics and thermonuclear strikes.
Massive area damage vs traited enemies only.

data.name: Orbital Annihilator Ragnarok
data.description:
Only the most elite among the Cat Army troops can
be trusted with this weapon of overwhelming power.
Massive area damage vs traited enemies only.

data.name: Mighty Thermae D-Lux
data.description:
World-famous mobile hot springs.
Travel in comfort and style. Omni-strikes
Freeze and are Strong against Zombies.

data.name: Subterra Guardians
data.description:
A secret organization defending the Cat army
from Doge sneak attacks from below. Omni-
strikes Freeze and are Strong against Zombies.

data.name: Subterra Sentinels
data.description:
At the frontlines of the Cat campaign to seek and
destroy underground Doge bases. Omni-strikes
Freeze and are Strong against Zombies.

data.name: Mighty Aethur Ltd.
data.description:
Treasure merchants travelling the world by zeppelin.
hauling a strange artifact emitting cosmic energy.
Omnistrikes deal Insane Damage to Zombies.

data.name: Atlantis Logistix
data.description:
The mystery artifact is being delivered to a covert
military unit under the supervision of elite security.
Omnistrikes deal Insane Damage to Zombies.

data.name: Ultra Atlantis Logistix
data.description:
he artifact is being delivered by ultra-elite security.
Insane Damage to Zombies; chance to Dodge.
Guaranteed to survive one lethal strike. (Omnistrike)

data.name: Mighty Deth-Troy-R
data.description:
Marauding Cats onboard an assault engine powered
by Aku energies, riding out to conquer the wastes.
Massive Area damage to Zombies/Angels/Aku

data.name: Siege Walker Diabolosa
data.description:
Top-of-the-line weaponry built using stolen Aku tech.
Its railgun obliterates all before it, to the very horizon.
Massive Area damage to Zombies/Angels/Aku

data.name: Obliterator Diabolosa
data.description:
A weapon of mass destruction built with Aku tech.
No weapon on the planet can stop its advance.
Deals Massive damage to Zombies, Angels, and Aku.

data.name: Mighty Carrowsell
data.description:
A grand show put on by a variety of performers.
Enraptures audiences with expectation-defying acts.
Colossus Slayer, Curses and Slows Black/Zombies.

data.name: Extraterrestrial Envanz
data.description:
An alien, disc-like ship that abducts the world's cows.
Why? To dissect and study them, of course!
Colossus Slayer, Curses and Slows Black and zombies.

data.name: Extradimensional Envanz
data.description:
Saucer from a future where our world is long dead,
here to preserve the DNA of Earth life. Colossus
Slayer, Tough vs. Black/Zombie, may Curse/Slow.

data.name: Mighty Sphinx Korps
data.description:
Construction corps delivering materials for the pharaoh's
tomb, while thwarting would-be robbers. Omnistrike
might Weaken, Tough vs Red/Metal/Zombies

data.name: Attack Battalion Convoys
data.description:
Next-gen tactical vehicles transporting scouts and
conducting raids on enemy camps. Omnistrike might
Weaken, Tough vs Red/Metal/Zombies

data.name: Bora
data.description:
Cosmic fire, brought to life!
This drake spirit commands flames
that strike Aliens for extra damage!

data.name: Bazibon
data.description:
With the power of a burning sun,
its flares annihilates Barriers.
Powerful defense & attack vs. Aliens.

data.name: Bazibastra
data.description:
Carries a red giant's rage within its tiny body,
ready to unleash a supernova on enemy Barriers.
Powerful defense & attack vs. Aliens

data.name: Mizli
data.description:
Cosmic water spirit, brought to life!
This nymph spirit controls waves
that knocks Aliens far back!

data.name: Marinmizu
data.description:
With waves that can split the Earth, its
attacks wash away enemy Barriers. Tough
anti-Alien defense and knockback attacks.

data.name: Mizuririn
data.description:
Master of water, sends cleansing waves to purify
mortal realms of evil, washing away Barriers.
Tough Anti-Alien defense and knockback attacks.

data.name: Aer
data.description:
Cosmic storms, brought to life!
This sylph spirit summons winds
for long distance area attacks!

data.name: Erphuan
data.description:
With winds that blast away the mountains,
no Barrier can stand against its assaults.
Tough, with long-range area attacks vs Aliens.

data.name: Aervanta
data.description:
Calling forth raging solar winds, can annihilate
even a mighty nebula with the slightest of efforts.
Tough, with long-range area attacks vs. Aliens.

data.name: Aervantex
data.description:
Supreme zephyr who sweeps away chaos from
their domain with healing gusts. Long-distance strikes
break Barriers, Tough & 100% Knockback vs. Aliens.

data.name: Voli
data.description:
Cosmic thunder, brought to life!
Summons lightning for a chance
to freeze Aliens with Area attacks.

data.name: Volta
data.description:
With lightning that rends the sky,
it annihilates enemy Barriers. Tough vs
Aliens, freezes with Area attacks.

data.name: Gigavolta
data.description:
A mighty spirit who channels power from the
storm that will eventually consume the cosmos.
Tough vs Aliens, 100% chance to Freeze.

data.name: Gravi
data.description:
A stone spirit who traversed the universe,
gathering cosmic power as it soared through space.
100% chance of Wave Attack.

data.name: Gravolo
data.description:
Stone spirit who commands the latent energies of
meteorites and asteroids to smash threats to the Cats.
Tough vs Aliens, 100% chance of Wave Attack.

data.name: Gravolodon
data.description:
Boulder spirit willed into being by the god of meteors.
Shatters Barriers with holy energy of the cosmos!
Tough vs Aliens, 100% chance of Wave Attack.

data.name: Yamii
data.description:
A phantom of dark, born in the depths of space
and come to earth in the heart of a fallen star.
Chance to Weaken Alien & Aku enemies

data.name: Yaminoir
data.description:
Creates a jet-black void that can drag planets
out of orbit and break Barriers with ease!
Tough vs Alien & Aku, with 100% Weaken

data.name: Yaminora
data.description:
Dark Lord of Spirits who devours starlight.
Pierces Barriers and blocks Wave attacks.
Tough vs Alien & Aku, with 100% Weaken

data.name: Bliza
data.description:
An ice specter from edge of the cosmos,
residing on an eternally frozen planet.
Might Slow Aliens/Zombies.

data.name: Blizana
data.description:
Commanding frost that freezes all matter around
it, this spirit shatters Barriers with vicious icicles.
Colossus Slayer, tough vs & 100% Slows Aliens & Zombies.

data.name: Tekachi
data.description:
A spirit of iron from the far reaches of space. Said
to be the embodiment of the metals of fallen stars.
Small chance to negate Floating, Alien, Angel atks.

data.name: Tetsukachi
data.description:
Spirit unmoved by even the strongest of impacts.
It's burly build gives it the ability to Break Barriers.
Resistant to Floating, Aliens, and Angels.

data.name: Baby Gao
data.description:
Might be a crybaby but he's still young!
He just doesn't realize the power within himself.
Strong against every enemy with a trait. (Area Atk)

data.name: Mighty Lord Gao
data.description:
Only appears to those who seek true power.
Strong against every enemy with a trait, immune
to Wave attacks. Might Critical (Area Atk)

data.name: Miko Mitama
data.description:
Chosen as a holy servant by the God of Cats,
infinite power lies hidden within her. Strong defense
vs. all enemies with traits. (Long Range/Area Atk)

data.name: Mitama the Oracle
data.description:
Dressed in bridal gowns, she appears to the blessed
as a sign of Cat God's favor. Her groom's identity is
unknown... Strong defense vs all traits, 100% chance to Slow.

data.name: D'artanyan
data.description:
A spunky young soldier with a lot to prove.
But even he doesn't know his own strength.
Extra damage to any traited enemy. (Long Range)

data.name: Meow-sketeer
data.description:
With his razor-sharp blade and unbreakable
spirit, he'll risk it all to protect his comrades.
Extra damage to any traited enemy. (Long Range)

data.name: Kasli the Scourge
data.description:
Young wanderer whose soul is a prison to 1000
vengeful ghosts. Trifle with her at your peril.
Long-range Surges might Knockback Traited!

data.name: Ritual Saint Kasli
data.description:
Having at last encountered kindness and love, she
now commands her wraiths for the cause of light!
Long-range Surges w/ chance to Knockback Traited!

data.name: Baby Garu
data.description:
Defends the helpless with all his power. He might
be small now, but great potential lies within him...
Omnistrikes, Tough vs. all traits, Immune to Waves.

data.name: Mighty Aegis Garu
data.description:
If one dear to you prays for your safety, Garu will
lend his immense might to defend you. Tough vs.
Traited, Wave Immunity, with Mini-Wave Omnistrikes.

data.name: Iz the Dancer
data.description:
Dancer who wants to make people smile with her art.
nShe just doesn't realize the power within herself.
Massive Omnistrike damage to any enemy with a trait.

data.name: Iz the Alluring Dancer
data.description:
Graceful dancer who entrances with elegant moves.
Conjures magical power delivers Insane Damage
to Traited enemies. Stronger after taking damage!

data.name: Child of Destiny Phono
data.description:
Destiny's plaything that bears a destructive fate.
Has no idea of the power that rests within them.
Massive damage to Traited (Long-Range Area Atk.)

data.name: King of Destiny Phonoa
data.description:
A mystical Cat that burns with the fires of fate.
Sworn to protect humanity until their dying breath.
Massive damage to Traited (Long-Range Area Atk.)

data.name: Shadow Gao
data.description:
Alternate-dimension Gao from the darkest timeline.
Seeks power at any cost. (Area Atk)
Massive damage vs non-attribute enemies.

data.name: Diabolic Gao
data.description:
Appears only to those who have known true despair.
Massive damage vs non-attribute enemies.
Freezes enemy briefly (Area Atk)

data.name: Dark Mitama
data.description:
Mitama has been betrayed by this cruel world
and has embraced darkness. (Long Range Atk) Tough
vs traitless enemies, 100% Slow chance.

data.name: Dark Mitama
data.description:
Like a widow mourning her lost love,
she is trapped within her memories. (Long Range Atk)
Tough vs traitless enemies and 100% Slow/Weaken chance.

data.name: D'arktanyan
data.description:
Wandering warrior pursuing true justice, resembles
a certain Meowsketeer. Gains attack power
when damaged, effective vs all traitless enemies!

data.name: Valiant D'arktanyan
data.description:
He values nothing more than justice and will happily
sacrifice it all for his cause! Gains attack power
when damaged, effective vs all traitless enemies!

data.name: Kasli the Bane
data.description:
As the curses within whisper to her, she wanders the
land desperately seeking to finally find inner peace.
Long-range Area Surge attacks will 100% Curse.

data.name: Kasli, Daughter of Chaos
data.description:
As her soul absorbs the cursed power of her enemies,
she has become the personification of disaster itself.
Long-range Area Surge attacks will 100% Curse.

data.name: Dark Aegis Garu
data.description:
Mirror version of the stalwart guardian beast,
born into a cold, harsh reality. Tough vs Traitless,
Mini-Wave Omnistrikes, with Wave Immunity.

data.name: Dark Beastlord Garu
data.description:
A vision of despair by one who could not protect those
most dear to them. Tough vs Traitless, Mini-Wave Omni-
strikes get stronger after damage, with Wave Immunity.

data.name: Iz the Dancer of Grief
data.description:
Iz, born in a world overflowing with grief. Consoles
humans with her dance of sadness and prayer.
Deals Massive damage to Traitless (Omni-Strike).

data.name: Iz the Lady of Mourning
data.description:
Dancer who prays to the gods in a world of death and
destruction. Her revivification dances deal Massive
Omni-Strike damage to Traitless, Colossus Slayer.

data.name: King of Doom Phono
data.description:
Another form that Phono can take which bears the
burden of destruction. Houses the flame of despair.
100% Slow, Long-range Area Mini-Surge

data.name: King of Extinction Phono
data.description:
A mysterious Cat that revived from ash with raging
flames. Severs the ring of fate with its power of hatred.
100% Slow, Long-range Area Mini-Surge

data.name: Pai-Pai
data.description:
Poster girl for a famous dim sum restaurant.
Always carries her heirloom Scarlet Hammer.
Resists Red attacks, massive area damage.

data.name: Pai-Pai Z
data.description:
Mystic seals were broken, unleashing the
sexy power of the Red Panda Hammer.
Resists Red attacks, massive area damage.

data.name: Pai-Pai DX
data.description:
Obliterates rivals in the underground arena with
the crushing power of the Master Panda Hammer!
Resists Red attacks, massive Area damage.

data.name: Strike Unit R.E.I.
data.description:
Cheerful young mech, built for anti-air warfare
using future tech forbidden by international law.
Resistant to/Massive area damage vs Floating.

data.name: Assault Unit R.E.I.
data.description:
After an upgrade, escaped from govt. custody
to use her powerful arsenal to help the innocent.
Resistant to/Massive area damage vs Floating.

data.name: Flight Unit R.E.I.
data.description:
Upgraded for aerial assault with long-hidden tech!
Rains searing rays down as she soars through the skies.
Resistant to/Massive Area damage vs Floating.

data.name: Sakura Sonic
data.description:
A totally average schoolgirl who likes bubble
tea and vanquishing demons. Tough vs. Metal,
Critical attacks slow & weaken Metal enemies.

data.name: Afterschool Sakura
data.description:
It’s tough to balance club activities and defending
the sacred legacy of your clan. Tough vs. Metal,
Critical attacks slow and weaken Metal enemies.

data.name: Sacred Blade Sakura
data.description:
If you must deliver heaven's punishment, you might
as well look really cute doing it. Might Critical, plus
Slows, Weakens and Insanely tough vs Metal.

data.name: Hell Warden Emma
data.description:
Hunter of evil souls trying to escape their
eternal punishment. Back to the pit with you!
Omnistrikes might Weaken. Immune to Waves.

data.name: Hell Sentinel Emma
data.description:
Judge, jury and executioner of the treacherous
dead who cast aside all honor for victory in battle.
Omnistrikes might Weaken. Immune to Waves.

data.name: Hell Commissioner Emma
data.description:
Dons her gear to embark on crusade of judgment.
With a hearty cry, arrives on the scene in record time.
Omnistrikes might Weaken. Immune to Waves.

data.name: Goddess of Light Sirius
data.description:
Goddess of light who descended from the brightest of
stars. Smothers even the slightest of evils with justice.
Strong against Colossal and Traited enemies.

data.name: Goddess of Sunrise Sirius
data.description:
Goddess of light keeping the world on the correct path.
Casts judgment on great evil with all of her might.
Strong against Colossal and Traited enemies.

data.name: Trickster Himeyuri
data.description:
Elusive vixen from a mystic realm. Hiding her
true face, wanders mortal realms hunting for the
weak-willed. Area atks might slow Floating/Angels.

data.name: Himeyuri Ninetails
data.description:
Her glorious true nature is revealed! Her mood has
improved with everyone's praise for her cute tails.
Area Attacks might slow Floating/Angels.

data.name: Fox Queen Himeyuri
data.description:
The lost harvest goddess has finally cast aside her
mask and blessed the earth with her true face.
Area Attacks might slow Floating/Angels.

data.name: Sea Maiden Ruri
data.description:
A mermaid NEET from the mystic seas. Dreams
of cute boys who'd risk drowning to date her.
Tough vs Red, weakens enemies.

data.name: Sea Mistress Ruri
data.description:
True love has granted her feet to walk beside her
dearest, but now all she wants is time to play
video games. Tough vs Red, weakens enemies.

data.name: Mer-Queen Ruri
data.description:
Built a undersea palace hoping her crush will drop
by. Until he grows gills, it's just her top-class gamer
den. Tough vs Red, with 100% Weaken chance.

data.name: Queen Reika
data.description:
A royal mummy from a mystic past. Actually, she
mummified herself by over-applying foundation.
Massive damage vs Aliens/Zombies (Area Atk)

data.name: Pharoah Reika
data.description:
She may have died from it, but overdoing makeup
keeps her looking stunning even 5000 years later.
Massive damage vs Aliens/Zombies (Area Atk)

data.name: Eternal Reika
data.description:
Charismatic royal corpse who will crumble to dust
if she ever leaves her prescription beauty throne.
Massive damage to Aliens/Zombies (Area Attack)

data.name: Wolfchild Deale
data.description:
A lost cub from a mighty werewolf pack
who found her calling in show business.
Might knockback Angels & Aliens (Area Atk)

data.name: Wolf Princess Deale
data.description:
The one-wolf show has revealed her true colors
to universal acclaim. Are you not entertained??
Might knockback Angels & Aliens (Area Atk)

data.name: Jester Queen Deale
data.description:
Started streaming her comedy act and earned
a million bucks! Follow her for a special reward~☆
Area attacks might knockback Angels/Aliens

data.name: Graveflower Verbena
data.description:
A lost soul who came home from the other side.
Hunting for a groom to fill her heart... or her stomach.
Might deliver critical strikes (Area Attacks)

data.name: Verbena the Bride
data.description:
Her hunger sated, she now looks forward to
the wedding day of her undead dreams.
Might deliver critical strikes (Area Attacks)

data.name: Opulent Verbena
data.description:
Using her late love's estate to live the afterlife of
her dreams. Now both her heart and stomach are
full to bursting. Area attacks might Critical.

data.name: Adventurer Kanna
data.description:
Fearless swordswoman from a world of fantasy!
Stumbled into a portal to the Cat Empire.
Massive Long-range Area Surge damage to Black enemies!

data.name: Swashbuckler Kanna
data.description:
Curious wanderer who returns home only to share
tales and treasure in between adventures.
Massive Long-range Area Surge damage to Black enemies!

data.name: Fabled Adventure Girl Kanna
data.description:
Has achieved enough to become legend, yet won't give
up adventuring. Behemoth Slayer, and deals Massive
Long-range Area Surge damage to Black enemies!

data.name: Spectral Goth Vega
data.description:
A Goddess of Death that has come from another world.
With the power of darkness, snuffs out followers of light.
Colossus Slayer, Strong against Traited enemies

data.name: Illusory Guardian Vega
data.description:
She has sealed away her dark, unmentionable past
and seeks redemption in the mortal plane.
Colossus Slayer, Strong against Traited enemies

data.name: Ninja Girl Tomoe
data.description:
Stupendous ninja from another world.
Hunger pangs give away her position when using stealth jutsu.
Might Freeze Traitless enemies and Aku.

data.name: Gourmand Ninja Girl Tomoe
data.description:
Can infiltrate targets via even the smallest of entrances.
Always munching on sweetbuns before a big mission.
Might Freeze Traitless enemies and Aku.

data.name: Li'l Valkyrie
data.description:
Valkyrie's younger sister. Top agent of Valhalla,
entrusted with high-risk missions to defend the
mortal realms. Area atk might break Barriers.

data.name: Wind Dancer Valkyrie
data.description:
Valkyrie's youngest sister. Nature itself has
blessed her with command over all forces of
the Earth. Area atk might break Barriers.

data.name: Li'l Valkyrie Dark
data.description:
Valkyrie's younger sister, marked by the darkness.
Valhalla's agent, smiting evil from within the abyss!
Blocks enemy Waves! Strikes with Wave Attacks!

data.name: Dark Rider Valkyrie
data.description:
Valkyrie's younger sister, a fearsome bounty hunter.
Rides with her posse to subdue agents of evil.
Blocks enemy Waves! Strikes with Wave Attacks!

data.name: Wonder MOMOCO
data.description:
Cosmic policegirl hunting interdimensional
criminals with lovely plasma beams of justice.
Freezes Red/Black/Angels with Wave Attacks.

data.name: Cutie MOMOCO
data.description:
The galaxy's most stylish detective, cleaning up
cosmic crime with her cutting edge Cutie Beam.
Area attacks freeze Red/Black/Angels.

data.name: Legeluga
data.description:
Not sure if this is a Cat…
There's just something about that
pandimensional crystal...

data.name: Legelan Pasalan
data.description:
Gaze upon its might and tremble!
There's no doubt that this one is
immune to Wave damage (Omni-Strike)

data.name: Musashi Miyamoto
data.description:
A wandering swordsman who has travelled to
the realm of carnage to master the Nichirin Blade.
Tough vs. / Insane Damage vs. Black.

data.name: Wargod Miyamoto
data.description:
The blood on his hands transformed the Nichirin
into a cursed Getsurin sword. You have no chance
Tough vs. / Insane Damage vs. Black.

data.name: Immortal Miyamoto
data.description:
God of war whose tactical know-how is recorded
in a legendary time. Colossus Slayer, deals
Insane damage to/Tough vs. Black enemies.

data.name: Headmistress Jeanne
data.description:
Chairwoman of the Cyber Academy, respected by
all. Summons ethereal spears to punish bad students.
Insane damage to Red/Floating. (Long-Range/Area)

data.name: Headmistress Jeanne ψ
data.description:
Her educational philosophy has become more...
unforgiving lately. But who's going to complain?
Insane damage to Red/Floating. (Long-Range/Area)

data.name: High Lord Babel
data.description:
The original dragon who became one with
the heavenly castle that controls the mortal realms.
Insanely tough vs. Red/Floating (Area Attack).

data.name: Babel the Darkflame
data.description:
His dragonic nature has been slowly corrupting
the heavenly castle over many millennia...
Insanely tough vs. Red/Floating (Area Attack)

data.name: God-Emperor Babel
data.description:
A legendary dragon whose energies have Colossus
Slayer properties. Insanely tough vs Red/Floating
(Area Attack)

data.name: Ushiwakamaru
data.description:
A celestial hero who has vowed to avenge his father.
His magic flute can track the evil H.E.I.K.E. corps.
Tough vs Angels with Insane Area Damage.

data.name: Colossal Benkei
data.description:
Ushi unearthed an invincible mecha ally during his
travels. Now victory over H.E.I.K.E. is all but certain.
Tough vs Angels with Insane Area Damage.

data.name: Doktor Heaven
data.description:
A fearsome scientist obsessed with using extra-
dimensional power to instantly sublimate matter.
Tough vs Black & Aliens with Area Attacks.

data.name: Professor Abyss
data.description:
Renowned temporal researcher who has harnessed
arcane crystal power that obliterates mundane matter.
Area Attacks deal massive damage to Black & Aliens.

data.name: Gaia the Creator
data.description:
The origin of all life... and she can choose
to undo it all whenever she pleases. Long-range
Area attacks deal extreme damage to Traited.

data.name: Gaia the Supreme
data.description:
The ultimate Goddess, who directs mana birthed
from the World Tree to annihilate enemies of Good.
Extreme damage to Traited. (Long-range Area Atks)

data.name: Mighty Kristul Muu
data.description:
A pulsing gem focuses mystic powers into an
unstable but insanely powerful blast. Omnistrike,
Wave shield, and High Def./Atk. vs. Zombies!

data.name: Doom Engine Pandora
data.description:
All the Cats' tech genius can't guarantee that those
extradimensional energies won't destroy the world.
Omnistrike, Wave Shield , High Def./Atk. vs. Zombies

data.name: Lumina
data.description:
The ultimate elemental manifestation, projected
from a dying star at the end of the universe.
Insanely tough, might Weaken, Barrier Breaker.

data.name: Luminalia
data.description:
Omniscient cosmic visionary from the future,
mastery of all elements allows it to ignore Barriers.
Insanely tough, 100% Weaken, Barrier Breaker.
